Package ac.code.verifier.helper

Class PathHelper

java.lang.Object
ac.code.verifier.helper.PathHelper
public class PathHelper extends Object
The class PathHelper provides methods that handle paths of the project.

      private static String findFileAbsolutePath(String pFullPathFromRootUntilCurent, String pFileName, String pFullRelativePath, String pRemainingRelativePath)
      Recursive method, finds the full path to the file.
      Parameters:
      pFullPathFromRootUntilCurent - The full path from the root to the tested folder.
      pFileName - The name of the file we are interested in.
      pFullRelativePath - The complete known relative path.
      pRemainingRelativePath - The part of the relative path we haven't found yet.
      Returns:
